channel.title: life on S U S H A N T's

item.title: A Reflection of 2021
item.description: Hello there. This post is all about my introspection to how the last year went so that I can take the good things and learn from my mistakes, hence try to improve the upcoming year. What went well this year? I spent the entire year working from my hometown, Siliguri. Many of my school friends had also come home. Met them after a very long time. Remembered and cherished the good old times.
